title: Large 1 bed! Prime location! Large apartment! Laundry in unit! No Fee
posting_body: ['Full-of-character 1-bedroom 1-bathroom apartment located on the second floor of a beautiful, small building in the Clinton Hill neighborhood of Brooklyn.', 'This apartment is close to all of the action on Fulton St.', 'Come check it out!', 'For more info or for a private tour contact Noah 832-566-2652', 'Amenities Include', '- Large and spacious bedroom', '- High ceilings throughout', '- Open kitchen with stainless steel appliances and dishwasher', '- Street facing unit with northern exposure', '- Large windows bring in ample sunlight', '- Exposed brick lends rustic charm', '- Split AC units, remote controlled', '- Fully tiled bathroom', '- Entire building has been gut renovated', '- Washer & Dryer in unit', '- Pets allowed case by case', '- Shared roof deck', 'This building is conveniently located near the A and C Subway lines, as well as the Shuttle, providing commute around Brooklyn and into Manhattan.', 'Fulton Street has lots of attractions!', 'Nearby Franklin Avenue is a hotspot!', 'with shopping, dining, banking, and entertainment — the works!', '-- This unit will definitely not stay on the market long, so schedule your viewing with Noah, 832-566-2652.']
